ing: 1 Gala apple - peeled, cored, and chopped
des: "I was experimenting with green juice recipes and finally made a batch I consider to be worth sharing! These ingredients blend together so well that you won't be able to tell there were greens in this drink! I love to have this for breakfast to kick start my day!"
ins: Place apple, kale, coconut meat, cucumber, celery, and spinach in a blender; top with coconut water, almond milk, water, and lemon juice. Blend on high for 30 seconds to 1 minute.
